tool_description: Normalizes and scales price data using various methods to prepare data for algorithm development, ensuring consistent ranges across different price levels and time periods.

input_data.description: Path to market data requiring normalization

normalization_method.description: Normalization approach (returns, log_returns, percent_change, min_max, z_score, robust_scale)

error_messages: Invalid input data: Cannot access the specified dataset or data is corrupted
Unsupported normalization method: Use supported methods (returns, log_returns, percent_change, min_max, z_score, robust_scale)
Missing price columns: One or more specified price columns not found in dataset
Invalid reference column: Reference column must exist in the dataset and be numeric
Zero or negative prices: Log returns normalization requires strictly positive prices
usage: Provide input data path and select normalization method. Optionally specify price columns and reference column. Returns normalized dataset ready for algorithm development.

normalization_applied.description: Type of normalization performed on the data

columns_normalized.description: List of columns that were normalized

scaling_parameters.description: Scaling parameters used (means, std devs, min/max values)
